block.p: Katherine Tyler Lewis and Schuyler Hallett Perry were married last evening . The Rev. Dr. Charles Allen Summers, a Presbyterian minister, performed the ceremony at the First Presbyterian Church in Richmond, Va., with the Rev. Susan N. Eaves, an Episcopal priest, taking part.

Mrs. Perry, 29, is a publicist in New York specializing in the technology and retail industries. She graduated from Williams College. She is the daughter of Annabel Morgan Edge of Richmond and the late Samuel Weslyn Lewis. Her mother retired as a professor of physical therapy at the Medical College of Virginia. Her father was president and chief executive of Morgan Brothers Bag Company, a firm in Richmond that makes paper bags. The bride is the stepdaughter of James Brannen Edge Jr.

He is the son of Heather Hilton Perry and Roger Hallett Perry of Burlington, Vt. His father retired as president of Champlain College and his mother retired as a real estate agent for Lang Associates.
